CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 15, 1957, pg. A11, reads: "'Omega "Sweetheart' - The high point of the spring awards banquet sponsored by Omicron Psi Chapter of Omega Psi Phi Fraternity held recently at the Hotel Fort Pitt, was the crowning of the Omega 'Sweetheart,' Together with the 'Sweetheart,' her attending court was also recognized.  The girls are, left to right, Paquita Sharp, Wilma Johnson, Doris Burleigh, the 'Sweetheart'; Betty Ann Vayson, a a former 'Sweetheart'; Shirley Ann Mike and Alyce Perrin.  Paul Thrash, Jack Tuff and Norman Johnson also were honored. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Paquita Sharp, Wilma Johnson, "Omega Sweetheart" Doris Burleigh, Betty Ann Vayson, Shirley Ann Mike, and Alyce Perrin, standing in front of Rookwood mural in Norse Room, Fort Pitt Hotel
